19 // labrom_mav_manager libraries
20 #include "labrom_mav_manager/manager.h"
21 // labrom_mav_blind_action libraries
22 #include "blind_action/take_off_server.h"
23 #include "blind_action/take_off_client.h"
24 #include "blind_action/blind.h"
25 // labrom_control libriares
26 #include "labrom_control/pid_simple.h"
27 
28 int main(int argc, char **argv){
29  // Initialize ROS within this node
30  ros::init(argc,argv,"MAVManager");
31  ros::NodeHandle nh;
32  // ROS Spin thread
33  boost::thread spin_thread(&manager::Spin);
34  // PID Controller for blind action
35  controllers::pid::Simple pid("Blind");
36  double kp=0.2, ki=1, kd=10*0.02, windup_thresh=10;
37  pid.SetParams(kp,ki,kd,windup_thresh);
38 
39  // Manager state machine
40  manager::ManagerState state= manager::WAIT_MOTORS_ON;
41 
42  // Action servers
43  int feedforward=40, max_thrust=50, loop_rate=20;
44  blind::take_off::TakeOffServer server(pid);
45 
46  while(ros::ok()){
47  // Spin thread
48  switch (state){
50  case manager::WAIT_MOTORS_ON:{
51  state = manager::TAKE_OFF;
52  break;
53  }
54  // Take off action
55  case manager::TAKE_OFF : blind::take_off::TakeOffClient client;
56  // Setting takeoff server parameters
57  server.SetParams(feedforward, max_thrust, loop_rate);
58  // Setting takeoff client parameters
59  double take_off_accel = 10.0;
60  client.SetGoal(take_off_accel);
61  // Perform take off attempt
62  double timeout = 30;
63  client.SendGoal(timeout);
67  state = manager::CLIMB;
68  break;
69  case manager::C
70  }
71 
72  }
73  spin_thread.join();
74 
75  // Shutdown ros and spin thread
76  ros::shutdown();
77 
78 
79  return 0;
80 }
